Classic Elegance Reimagined
8Street Brickell is an upscale Miami cocktail bar and lounge designed from the ground up with luxe couches, colorful lighting, and a floor-to-ceiling main bar. As a modern speakeasy with food and live DJs, we’ve reimagined the classic elegance of the 1920s by making it more chic.
Join Us Today!

About Us
A Cocktail Lounge Like No Other
Mission Statement
8STREET BRICKELL captures the indefinable essence of Miami’s Brickell neighborhood, providing an approachably unique & memorable experience.
Here we honor what was, what is & what will be.
It’s our little corner spot, our juke joints nod to a secret society where speak easy’s held court celebrating its creativity, its good humor, & its eccentricities.
In every detail you’ll see a kind of modern sophistication that is neither overly stuffy nor frivolously ornate, leaving an impression to last.
With an interior that speaks the easy speak, warm over scale elements of wood & button tuft upholstery & a soaring ceiling at 15’ undulates in a decidedly feminine gesture.
You can’t be everything to everyone, but you can be everything to someone.
Locals welcome, tourist will find us.
Subtle chic in a modern uptake of the classic speak easy.
8STREET BRICKELL – BAR NONE.
Behind the Logo
Like nightlife, the logo represents the infinite possibilities of a night out in good company.
Its shape borrows from the Mobius strip as the logo’s path intertwines the symbols ‘8’ & ‘S’.
At its heart, it prompts a deeper discussion about cyclical nature & draw of the bar.
Patrons venture out for a night of fun & spontaneity, return home, only to come back again tomorrow.
8STREET BRICKELL is the junction where your life & your nightlife converge.
We Believe
AT 8STREET BRICKELL, WE BELIEVE…
PEOPLE LIKE TO BE TREATED NICELY & WITH RESPECT.
We believe…quality of service is paramount.
We believe…music makes the moment.
We believe…A NIGHT SPENT WITH FRIENDS IS A NIGHT WELL SPENT.
8STREET BRICKELL.
